title: Episode 58 w/ Mike Epps
itunes:title: Episode 58 w/ Mike Epps
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with comedy legend Mike Epps. The guys talk about Mike Epps beginnings, how he landed his role in the Friday films, the comedy industry, social media, drugs, and a lot more. This makes for a hilarious Drink Champs episode! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
